marketing: Your now protected with managed antivirus and managed malware for your Mac. Both services are cloud managed so we can keep tabs on your computer without even needing to login remotely. Let us manage your Mac's security.
marketing2: With our auto-updating policies your computer will never be out of date. The number one reason for infections isn't lack of virus software its lack of proper updated definitions being installed. We manage that for you.
marketing3: Business owners do not have time to let a virus or malware issue slow them down. With the realtime, endpoint protection you receive from our managed service you can be sure that your business will ever skip a beat.
